text: If you’re a regular reader of OSXDaily and you also happen to use various social networks, give us a follow! We’re on X/Twitter, Mastodon, Facebook, Instagram, and we have an RSS feed, and a free email newsletter with the days posts. Stay in touch with OSXDaily through your favorite channels, and never miss a post from your favorite source of Apple tips and tricks. X/Twitter: @osxdaily Mastodon: @osxdaily Facebook: @osxdaily Instagram: @osxdaily Subscribe to the OSXDaily Email Newsletter RSS: https://osxdaily.com/feed/ As for RSS, if you want a fantastic free RSS reader for Mac, iPhone, or iPad, don’t miss NetNewsWire, which is one of the best. Following us on social networks and email helps you keep track of our latest and greatest material, and also helps us reach you without having to rely on the increasingly finicky nature of Google (whose constant changes and AI search results are destroying many web businesses – ours included – sigh). Is X, Mastodon, Facebook, RSS, and email enough? Are we missing any notable social channel or distribution channel that you’d find useful? Let us know in the comments! We’re pondering setting up a Threads with an auto-feed for posts, and perhaps even a TikTok, or maybe even regular posts to Instagram again. If you have any ideas for distribution or social channels, feel free to share them below. Thanks for reading OSXDaily, and for following us!
html:
If you’re a regular reader of OSXDaily and you also happen to use various social networks, give us a follow! We’re on X/Twitter, Mastodon, Facebook, Instagram, and we have an RSS feed, and a free email newsletter with the days posts.

Stay in touch with OSXDaily through your favorite channels, and never miss a post from your favorite source of Apple tips and tricks.

  • X/Twitter: @osxdaily
  • Mastodon: @osxdaily
  • Facebook: @osxdaily
  • Instagram: @osxdaily
  • Subscribe to the OSXDaily Email Newsletter
  • RSS: https://osxdaily.com/feed/

As for RSS, if you want a fantastic free RSS reader for Mac, iPhone, or iPad, don’t miss NetNewsWire, which is one of the best.

Following us on social networks and email helps you keep track of our latest and greatest material, and also helps us reach you without having to rely on the increasingly finicky nature of Google (whose constant changes and AI search results are destroying many web businesses – ours included – sigh).

Is X, Mastodon, Facebook, RSS, and email enough? Are we missing any notable social channel or distribution channel that you’d find useful? Let us know in the comments! We’re pondering setting up a Threads with an auto-feed for posts, and perhaps even a TikTok, or maybe even regular posts to Instagram again. If you have any ideas for distribution or social channels, feel free to share them below.

Thanks for reading OSXDaily, and for following us!
